section.name: Capital One eratocode Maven Plugin
section.p: This project is a Maven Plugin specifically for running eratocode scans as part of your mavenized build.

section.name: Documentation
section.p: The package descriptions in the JavaDoc give an overview of the available features and various project reports are provided. Furthermore, we have a user guide for those wishing to use this project to run eratocode scans using a mavenized process.

section.name: Getting Involved
section.p:
The c1-build-plugins is the main channel of communication for contributors. Please find the project that you are interested in and use the GitHub issue tracking system to get involved. Also, feel free to contact anyone who has commits in the repositories with questions. Please read the
CONTRIBUTING.md before attempting to submit any code. It will be clear if you have not, and your patch will be less likely to be accepted.

section.name: Support
section.p: The github issue tracking system act as the main support forum.
Bug reports and enhancements are also welcomed via the github issue tracking system issue tracker. Please read the instructions carefully.
